# Icon



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                     | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `ariaLabel` | `aria-label` | Specifies the label to use for accessibility. Defaults to the icon name.                        | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | `undefined` |
| `color`     | `color`      | Basic color variations.                                                                         | `"inherit" \| "neutral-grey-1" \| "neutral-grey-2" \| "neutral-grey-3" \| "neutral-grey-4" \| "neutral-grey-5" \| "neutral-grey-6" \| "neutral-grey-7" \| "neutral-grey-8" \| "porsche-black" \| "porsche-dark" \| "porsche-dark-red" \| "porsche-light" \| "porsche-red" \| "state-focus" \| "status-green" \| "status-red" \| "status-yellow" \| "surface-dark" \| "surface-light"` | `'inherit'` |
| `lazy`      | `lazy`       | If enabled, ion-icon will be loaded lazily when it's visible in the viewport. Default, `false`. | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `false`     |
| `size`      | `size`       | The size of the icon.                                                                           | `"inherit" \| "large" \| "medium" \| "small"`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | `'small'`   |
| `source`    | `source`     | Specifies which icon to use.                                                                    | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | `undefined` |
